segments.text: I peek into the kitchen and see the woman at work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, her apron tied neatly around her dress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on full blast, but she's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over the sink, drenching the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming right under her, soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy climbs the stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, looking ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, reaching up eagerly for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, like little thieves in the night.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But with the wet floor, slipping is a real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light on the tidy garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how unaware the adult is of this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies will be the least of their worries soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt in this silly escapade.
segments.speaker: PAR
